scripts.test: npm run build; nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text-summary --report-dir=docs/coverage -o docs mocha
scripts.doc: npm run build; jsdoc -d docs -c jsdoc.json
scripts.compile-syntax: npm run build && node bin/eggc.js examples/syntax.egg
scripts.compile-funfun: npm run build && node bin/eggc.js examples/fun-fun.egg
scripts.compile-dodef: npm run build && node bin/eggc.js examples/dodefsum.egg
